Title: Go all out to study culture
Designer: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: "Study culture" (学文化) means learning how to read and write (and thereby acquire culture).
Theme: Combat Illiteracy Campaigns (1950-1956)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
